medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain, chest pain, shortness of breath, and near-syncope.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient has had symptoms for 1 day. Symptoms began with abdominal and chest pain, with associated shortness of breath and near-syncope. The patient felt dizzy today and nearly passed out, turning blue. Previous provider attributed dizziness to Parkinson's disease. The patient also reported a sore throat for the past week. Denies nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HFpEF, HTN, recurrent UTIs, Parkinson's disease, valvular disease, osteoporosis, renal mass, colonic polyps, osteoarthritis, urinary incontinence, chronic abdominal pain.
medical_history.family_history: Brother with cardiac history and CVA; mother with unknown abdominal cancer.
